messages.title: If elected...
messages.content: Jason Hadden pledges to: Fight for more police on our streets, lower Council Tax bills and support local business. Save the A&E and maternity wards at Mayday hospital from closure. Restore equal rights for our pensioners. Hold weekly surgeries and monthly public meetings to stay in touch. Be open about his expense claims and diary so you can see what he is claiming and doing. Give straight and honest answers to questions.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight for more police on our streets
Save the A&E and maternity wards at Mayday hospital from closure
Restore equal rights for our pensioners
Be open about his expense claims and diary so you can see what he is claiming and doing
Hold weekly surgeries and monthly public meetings to stay in touch
Give straight and honest answers to questions

mentions.tacticalSituation: Ask yourself one thing - Has North Croydon improved under the current Labour MP? If that answer is no then it really is time for a change

leaflet.personalStatement: Over the last three years Jason has worked hard to make North Croydon a better place.

images.caption: Jason Hadden engaging with the public

leaflet.additionalNotes: Jason said 'When you come to vote for your MP at the General Election... I ask you to lend me your support to provide a fresh approach to politics in North Croydon.'
